tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CompetencyAssessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  competency_name VARCHAR(50),
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessment_score DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Competencies (
    competency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competency_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    competency_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    competency_id INT,
    score INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (competency_id) REFERENCES Competencies(competency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DevelopmentPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    competency_id INT,
    plan_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (competency_id) REFERENCES Competencies(competency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Assessments (
  assessment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  employee_id INT REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),
  competency_id INT REFERENCES Competencies(competency_id),
  score INT
);

CREATE TABLE DevelopmentPlans (
  plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  employee_id INT REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),
  competency_id INT REFERENCES Competencies(competency_id),
  target_completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Assessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  competency_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessment_score FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (competency_id) REFERENCES Competencies(competency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DevelopmentPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_due_date DATE,
  plan_status VARCHAR,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProgressTracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_id INT,
  plan_id INT,
  progress_status VARCHAR,
  progress_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES Assessments(assessment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES DevelopmentPlans(plan_id)
);
